Reviews.Title: A great photo package for anyone!
Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: Love the convenience of this camera. You can get great high-res photos (20 megapixels feels like a luxury when you see how amazing your photos come out!)  I was impressed with the length of time the battery charge lasts. I used a Canon and a Fuji previously and both had batteries that ran down much more quickly. I was so impressed with this package I ordered two more as Christmas gifts.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Elsa Larson
Reviews.Content: Ordered one first for our daughters graduation gift, then ordered one for ourselves. Incredibly clear pictures, long battery life, sd card holds all the pictures you could ever need it to

Reviews.Title: NOT HAPPY!
Reviews.Author: Charoma
Reviews.Content: I am not happy with this camera and plan on returning it. My main concern is the long pause between taking one picture to the next.  I have small grandchildren and you have to take as many pictures as possible, as quickly as possible.  The pause must be 4 or 5 seconds which may not seem long but when you have children that are moving and not holding a pose for more than a second or two it just ruins any possible shots.

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever
Reviews.Author: Sonya Holbert
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of use and the high picture quality. Also, pictures are easy to download with the thumb drive included.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Frank Halstead "Old Guy"
Reviews.Content: The package included everything as advertised.  It arrived on time. Nothing was broken. The camera is easy to use and takes excellent pictures. What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, great deal
Reviews.Author: cjb
Reviews.Content: After searching for a good camera under $125, I found this bundle for under $115! It came, as advertised, with extras that I would have had to purchase separately if I'd just bought the camera which I'd seen in Target and other online dealers.I started using it right out of the box and found most of the basic functions easy to learn and use. I want to say that I'm over 65 and my previous digital camera (my first) was nearly 10 years old. There are features and editing tools that I'm still learning but if you have some basic knowledge and can read, this is really simple to figure out. The picture quality is really beautiful, the 7X zoom is adequate for my needs and having the 16GB memory card is a real bonus along with a spare battery. Since the camera is really small and lightweight, this is a great item to take just about anywhere as it fits in your pocket.The only negative that I see is the camera strap is much too short, would have preferred one long enough to hang from your neck for safety of the camera. Other than that, it's a great camera at a really nice price.

Reviews.Title: Delivered on time.vey good camera , very handy and fancy
Reviews.Author: Franklin
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time.vey good camera , very handy and fancy. too many other itmes like, tripod, memory card,battery etc.. great bundle offer

Reviews.Title: happy with our purchase
Reviews.Author: salsero
Reviews.Content: I give this rating because it exceeded my expectations we had a sony camera but it just was not as good as this one

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Keri Paulson
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at how much came in this package! I'm excited to use the tripods! The camera is really nice for the price as well! It doesn't take very good photos at night but I just needed something to take some quick pictures.

ProductInfo.Features:
7x wide-angle NIKKOR glass lens
720p HD video recording
Vibration Reduction helps keep shots steady
20.1-megapixel CCD image sensor
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX S3500 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Red) Bundle with 16GB SD Memory Card + Card Reader + Replacement EN-EL19 Battery + Camera Case + Spider Tripod and Accessory
